subject: Automobile Racing
Alcohol Abuse
lead_paragraph: Al Unser Jr., a two-time Indianapolis 500 winner, will plead no contest to a charge of driving under the influence stemming from a January crash on a freeway in Nevada.
snippet: Al Unser Jr., a two-time Indianapolis 500 winner, will plead no contest to a charge of driving under the influence stemming from a January crash on a freeway in Nevada.
